product_overview: Vitan Task Management is a full-stack productivity application designed to streamline task, project, and team management with integrated WhatsApp communication and real-time analytics. The platform provides multi-language support, modern responsive UI, secure authentication, and seamless collaboration capabilities for enhancing organizational efficiency.
core_goals: Enable efficient task creation, assignment, tracking, and status management with support for comments and multi-language inputs.
Facilitate project management including creation, team collaboration, and template utilization for quick setup.
Provide robust user and team management with role-based access control and collaboration features.
Integrate WhatsApp messaging for notifications, OTP verification, and bulk communication to enhance user engagement.
Deliver insightful analytics dashboards for tasks, projects, and team performance to aid data-driven decisions.
Ensure responsive, accessible, and user-friendly interfaces across devices with compliant UI components.
Implement secure authentication via email and WhatsApp OTP with JWT-based session management.
Maintain robust error handling and seamless API integration with retry logic for reliability.
key_features: Authentication system supporting WhatsApp and email-based OTP verification for secure login.
Comprehensive task management with CRUD operations, status tracking, comments, and task assignments.
Project management including creation, updating, member roles, and team collaboration.
Team management features with user role assignment, contact management, and collaboration views.
Analytics dashboard presenting data visualizations for tasks, projects, and team performance using charts.
AI admin dashboard facilitating AI service management and cost monitoring.
WhatsApp integration enabling sending messages, notifications, administration, and webhook handling.
Template system for tasks and projects to accelerate creation workflows.
Reusable UI component library built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS ensuring accessibility and responsiveness.
Client-side form validation with multi-language support and error feedback.
State management using React hooks for real-time and persistent data synchronization.
Routing system with protected routes and smooth navigation.
Notification system with real-time toast messages for user feedback.
Comprehensive error handling for frontend and backend operations.
user_flow_summary: User authenticates using phone number or email with OTP verification via WhatsApp or email.
User navigates through dashboard, views tasks and projects, creates new tasks using form with validation.
User updates task status, adds comments, assigns tasks, and uses templates to streamline workflows.
User manages projects by creating new projects, adding members, and collaborating within the team.
User accesses analytics dashboard to review task and project metrics and team performance visualizations.
Admin user manages AI services and WhatsApp integrations through dedicated admin dashboards.
User receives real-time notifications and error messages for prompt feedback.
All interactions are responsive and accessible across desktop and mobile devices with keyboard and screen reader support.
validation_criteria: All forms require client-side validation with multi-language support and provide real-time feedback on errors.
Authentication workflows must correctly verify OTP via WhatsApp or email and securely manage sessions with JWT tokens.
CRUD operations for tasks and projects must properly validate inputs, handle errors, and update UI accordingly.
API endpoints must respond correctly with proper data and error codes; server must handle invalid requests gracefully.
UI components must render without warnings, maintain accessibility standards including ARIA labels and keyboard navigation.
Routing and navigation must correctly handle deep linking, protected routes, and URL parameters.
Notifications and toast messages must appear timely and reflect actual system state changes or errors.
Analytics data must accurately reflect real-time task, project, and team metrics with correct visualizations.
WhatsApp integration must successfully send messages, handle webhooks, and comply with rate limits.
Responsive design must adapt to various screen sizes ensuring usability on desktop, tablet, and mobile.
Backend services must maintain 100% uptime with API endpoints accessible and returning expected data format.
System must demonstrate proper error handling both on client and server sides with consistent error response structure.
